title: Community-Based Science Competency Enhancement Program in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Long-term course for enhancing science-related practical skills within enterprises, targeting learners accustomed to asynchronous learning via digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers using online learning tools to complete science problem-solving projects at least three times.
Learners share opinions and provide feedback on science-related topics at least twice a week through community discussion boards
Learners pass a formative assessment achieving at least 80% understanding of scientific concepts based on materials provided in the LMS
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
